Game: Alex Kidd in Miracle World 2 2017 What is this, there was another Miracle World game?! No, actually this is fan-made. But it would be easy to think it's from Sega, as it has great level design, nice graphics, and an original soundtrack. The plot takes place just months after the first game and completely ignores the disappointing official sequel, Alex Kidd in the Enchanted Castle. 1 <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/05d622d8-6168-443b-a475-9c9905999aef.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/1b603d6f-beea-437e-8a2c-af8834f02beb.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/b7dba88a-50cd-4076-90a3-e84452856cd0.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/f10a45ab-b167-41d8-958b-816f09b2718f.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/6daacbf9-f549-42f4-9f66-5c45a252adc9.jpg Not Rated Platform
